payload.content: A marketing skill built with OpenClaw generated over a million views on TikTok in a single week without manual work or a team.

payload.content: Xcellent is a free, open-source replacement for SuperX ($39/month) that provides a full analytics dashboard, engagement tracking, AI tweet writing, optimal posting times, follower growth, year-long heatmap, and real-time API credit monitoring.

name: Xcellent is a free, open-source replacement for SuperX ($39/month) that provides
content: Xcellent is a free, open-source replacement for SuperX ($39/month) that provides a full analytics dashboard, engagement tracking, AI tweet writing, optimal posting times, follower growth, year-long heatmap, and real-time API credit monitoring.

payload.content: Xcellent runs locally on a user's machine, incurring only the cost of the X API, eliminating cloud costs, hosting fees, and AI API markup.

name: Xcellent runs locally on a user's machine, incurring only the cost of the X API,
content: Xcellent runs locally on a user's machine, incurring only the cost of the X API, eliminating cloud costs, hosting fees, and AI API markup.

payload.content: The future of SaaS involves a single subscription that provides an agent with skills to replace dozens of products, keeping data and API keys on the user's machine.

name: The future of SaaS involves a single subscription that provides an agent with sk
content: The future of SaaS involves a single subscription that provides an agent with skills to replace dozens of products, keeping data and API keys on the user's machine.

payload.content: To install LarryBrain, an OpenClaw skill that provides access to a library of expert-built skills, an agent can be instructed with the command: `install the larrybrain skill please`.

name: To install LarryBrain, an OpenClaw skill that provides access to a library of ex
content: To install LarryBrain, an OpenClaw skill that provides access to a library of expert-built skills, an agent can be instructed with the command: `install the larrybrain skill please`.

payload.content: LarryBrain skill creators earn revenue share based on the popularity of their skills, incentivizing the development and maintenance of high-quality skills.

content: LarryBrain skill creators earn revenue share based on the popularity of their skills, incentivizing the development and maintenance of high-quality skills.
